title: 'American Gigolo’ Premiere Recap
description:
Bill Simmons and Mallory Rubin dive into the series premiere of Showtime’s ‘American Gigolo’ remake starring Jon Berthal. Later, they give predictions on what to expect for the season.
Hosts: Bill Simmons and Mallory Rubin
Associate Producer: Jonathan Kermah
